result.ga: Bhíodh raon fairsing ábhair faoi chaibidil iontu agus tuairimí á nochtadh faoi achan rud faoin spéir
result.orig: Bhíodh raon fairsing ábhair faoi chaibidil iontu agus tuairimí á nochtadh faoi achan rud faoin spéir
result.html: Bhíodh raon fairsing ábhair faoi chaibidil iontu agus tuairimí á nochtadh faoi achan rud faoin spéirThey [ie. blogs] were dealing with a wide range of topics and giving opinions on everything under the sun.
result.ponchtml: Ḃíoḋ raon fairsing áḃair faoi ċaibidil iontu agus tuairimí á noċtaḋ faoi aċan rud faoin spéirThey [ie. blogs] were dealing with a wide range of topics and giving opinions on everything under the sun.

result.eng: That's why I came here. That's what brought me this way.
result.ga: Sin an rud a thug an bealach mé
result.orig: Sin an rud a thug an bealach mé
result.html: Sin an rud a thug an bealach méThat's why I came here. That's what brought me this way.
result.ponchtml: Sin an rud a ṫug an bealaċ méThat's why I came here. That's what brought me this way.

result.eng: They decorated everything as neatly as they could.
result.ga: Feistíodh 'ach aon rud chomh deismir agus a féadadh
result.orig: Feistíodh 'ach aon rud chomh deismir agus a féadadh
result.html: Feistíodh 'ach aon rud chomh deismir agus a féadadhThey decorated everything as neatly as they could.
result.ponchtml: Feistíoḋ 'aċ aon rud ċoṁ deismir agus a féadaḋThey decorated everything as neatly as they could.

result.eng: Instead of gathering sense, what he's doing is losing whatever amount he had.
result.ga: In áit a bheith ag cruinniú céille is é rud atá sé ag cailleadh cibé a bhí aige
result.orig: In áit a bheith ag cruinniú céille is é rud atá sé ag cailleadh cibé a bhí aige
result.html: In áit a bheith ag cruinniú céille is é rud atá sé ag cailleadh cibé a bhí aigeInstead of gathering sense, what he's doing is losing whatever amount he had.
result.ponchtml: In áit a ḃeiṫ ag cruinniú céille is é rud atá sé ag cailleaḋ cibé a ḃí aigeInstead of gathering sense, what he's doing is losing whatever amount he had.

result.eng: You will get something you didn't bargain for!
result.ga: Gheobhaidh tusa rud nach dearn tú margadh air
result.orig: Gheobhaidh tusa rud nach dearn tú margadh air
result.html: Gheobhaidh tusa rud nach dearn tú margadh airYou will get something you didn't bargain for!
result.ponchtml: Ġeoḃaiḋ tusa rud naċ dearn tú margaḋ airYou will get something you didn't bargain for!

result.eng: People will tell stories about this when it's gone.
result.ga: Beidh scéalaíocht ar an rud a bheas anseo nuair imeos sé
result.orig: Beidh scéalaíocht ar an rud a bheas anseo nuair imeos sé
result.html: Beidh scéalaíocht ar an rud a bheas anseo nuair imeos séPeople will tell stories about this when it's gone.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ scéalaíoċt ar an rud a ḃeas anseo nuair imeos séPeople will tell stories about this when it's gone.

result.eng: You could have gotten rid of him a little more kindly than you did.
result.ga: Thiocfadh leat a chur díot rud beag ní ba síodúla ná mar a rinne tú
result.orig: Thiocfadh leat a chur díot rud beag ní ba síodúla ná mar a rinne tú
result.html: Thiocfadh leat a chur díot rud beag ní ba síodúla ná mar a rinne túYou could have gotten rid of him a little more kindly than you did.
result.ponchtml: Ṫiocfaḋ leat a ċur díot rud beag ní ba síodúla ná mar a rinne túYou could have gotten rid of him a little more kindly than you did.

result.eng: He would put up with anything for her.
result.ga: D'fhulaingeodh sé rud ar bith ar a sonsa
result.orig: D'fhulaingeodh sé rud ar bith ar a sonsa
result.html: D'fhulaingeodh sé rud ar bith ar a sonsaHe would put up with anything for her.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟulaingeoḋ sé rud ar biṫ ar a sonsaHe would put up with anything for her.
